CmdLine: true  && git clone --depth 1 --shallow-submodules https://github.com/SpaceVim/SpaceVim.git $HOME/.SpaceVim  && git clone --depth 1 --shallow-submodules https://github.com/thawk/dotspacevim.git $HOME/.SpaceVim.d  && rm -r $HOME/.SpaceVim/.git $HOME/.SpaceVim.d/.git  && mkdir -p $HOME/.config  && ln -s $HOME/.SpaceVim $HOME/.config/nvim  && sed -i -e '/begin optional layers/,/end optional layers/ d' $HOME/.SpaceVim.d/init.toml  && git clone --depth 1 --shallow-submodules https://github.com/Shougo/dein.vim.git $HOME/.cache/vimfiles/repos/github.com/Shougo/dein.vim  && nvim --headless +'call dein#install()' +qall  && (find $HOME/.cache/vimfiles -type d -name ".git" | xargs rm -r)  && true
Commands.Name: run

Commands.Expression: RUN true  && cat $HOME/.SpaceVim.d/additional.toml >> $HOME/.SpaceVim.d/init.toml  && nvim --headless +'call dein#install()' +qall  && (find $HOME/.cache/vimfiles -type d -name ".git" | xargs rm -r)  && nvim --headless +qall  && true
Commands.Name: onbuild
